description.en: DD Smart is cornerstone operating system of a trusted society developed by the Japanese technical team Smart Community for 5 years. which equipped with a multi-level, fully open, and transparent blockchain underlying operating system. It is determined to build the underlying operating system of helping the global enterprise chain to the main chain blockchain. In addition, DD Smart represents a brand-new ecological architecture and financial technology concept, and is the ultimate form of an idealized trusting society.
